channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A dial for tuning the immune system: Discovery sheds light on why COVID makes some sicker than others

item.title: Breakthrough brings body-heat powered wearable devices closer to reality

item.title: At what age do children begin identifying with STEM? The answer is younger than we thought

item.title: Research team discovers seven new dark comets, identifies 2 types based on orbit and size

item.title: Superflares once per century

item.title: Overfishing has halved shark and ray populations since 1970

item.title: How the dirt under our feet could affect human health
item.description: Researchers are linking human activity to increased gene transfer from soil bacteria to humans.
